Whether illegally smol or heckin' chonker, from fine boi to absolute unit, you'll fit in at Fat Cat Café

No microchip feeders here!

All noms served on a flat dish to avoid whisker fatigue

Unlimited access to water fountain with purchase of any entrée

We know you love your hoomans, but we here at Fat Cat Café understand your mealtime needs. No deep dishes that irritate your whiskers, no microchip feeders, and no water anywhere near your noms.
